title: Dismissing notifications still opens link in browser
body: Every esports notification I receive will open up a browser tab if I click on the "x" button to dismiss it.  Is this intended behavior?

replies.body: OP is correct.  It opens a link when you dismiss it.  I shouldn't have to disable esports entirely.  I should be able to select the ones I want, and dismiss the ones I want.

It shouldn't be launching the browser if you click on the x to dismiss that notification. I'm wondering if you might be accidentally dragging the mouse or missing the X, but there should be a button you can enable in the client options under Notifications to disable Esports notifications entirely if you need to.

https://i.gyazo.com/ce421b6719d11b7a108e3a8507e0d15e.png
